title: Tacos Baked BBQ
ingredients: Â½ cup of grated cheese of your choice
instructions: Step 1: Heat in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add butter, when it melts pour in the beaten eggs.
Step 2: Let the eggs cook a little and pour them into an additional container. Add the cheese, salt and pepper, and mix.
Step 3: Finally, add Barbecue Taco along with the chopped Chives.
Step 4: Bake for 15 minutes and serve.
